table.caption: Table F. 1 2 â€“ Embedded file stream hint table, per-embedded file stream group entries
head: Item
Size (bits)
Description
rows: The object number of the embedded file stream that this entry is associated with.

The number of objects in this embedded file streams group. This item may be 0, meaning that there are only shared object references. In this case, item 4 for this group is greater than zero and item 3 is zero.

The length of this embedded file stream group, in bytes. This item may be 0, which shall mean that there are only shared object references. In this case, item 4 for this group is greater than zero and item 2 is zero.
The number of shared objects referenced by this embedded file stream group.

A bit-packed list of shared object identifiers; that is, indices into the shared object hint table. Item 4 for this group shall specify how many shared object identifiers is associated with the group.
